full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Project Title and Reference Information

* **Project Title (English) / Titre (Français)**: W0107-23CY01 - Light Armoured Vehicle (LAV) Equipment Storage Cage / Véhicule Blindé Léger (VBL) cages d'entreposage de l'équipement
* **Reference Number (English) / Numéro de Référence (Français)**: WS4135114543-Doc4135400918
* **Solicitation Number (English) / Numéro de Sollicitation (Français)**: WS4135114543

## Project Overview

The Department of National Defence, Canadian Forces Base Petawawa, is seeking bids for the replacement and update of its current Light Armoured Vehicle (LAV) 6.0 Equipment Storage Cage. The cage is used to store equipment issued to Scale (EIS) and must be replaced with a new storage cage that meets the necessary standards.

## Project Requirements

* Deliver a minimum of fifty-four (54) assembled Storage Cages with a warranty of at least two years.
* The requirements include the delivery of the assembled Storage Cage and ensuring that it meets the necessary standards for storage and functionality.

## Important Dates

* **Publication Date (English) / Date de Publication (Français)**: 2023-08-25
* **Tender Closing Date (English) / Date d'Appel Offres (Français)**: 2023-10-05T14:00:00 (Note: The closing time has been amended)
* **Expected Contract Start/End Date (English) / Date de Démarrage/Fin de Contrat Prévût (Français)**: 2023 (start) / 2024-06-29 (end)

## Tender Details

* **Trade Commodity Category (English) / Catégorie de Commodity Comm. Ext. (Français)**:
	+ Shelving and storage (24102000)
	+ Lockers (56101520)
	+ Storage cabinets (56101530)
	+ Industrial cabinets or drawers or shelving (56111906)
* **Procurement Method (English) / Méthode d'Approvisionnement (Français)**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria (English) / Criteres de Sélection (Français)**: Lowest Price
